title: Biclustering in Scikit-Learn
description: Biclustering is a method that simultaneously clusters rows and columns of a data matrix. This allows us to identify submatrices within the data matrix that have specific properties. Biclustering is useful in various domains, including data analysis, image processing, and bioinformatics.

meta.title: Biclustering in Scikit-Learn: Unveiling Hidden Patterns in Data
meta.description: Explore the power of biclustering algorithms in Scikit-Learn for data analysis, image processing, and bioinformatics.
meta.keywords: biclustering, scikit-learn, data analysis, machine learning, data mining
